messages.content: <QUERY>How do I use the word <WORD>aheai</WORD> in a Yanomami sentence?</QUERY>
<WORD>aheai</WORD> <POS>Verb (Intransitive)</POS> <DEFINITION>to approach (beginning of a process)</DEFINITION> <USAGE>Yanomami verbs typically do not require an object</USAGE>
